messages.ssml: <speak>The World Health Organization states that Coronaviruses (CoV) are a large family of viruses that cause illness ranging from the common cold to a more severe lung infection. <sub alias="covid 19">COVID-19</sub> is the disease caused by a novel coronavirus.</speak>

<speak>The World Health Organization states that Coronaviruses (CoV) are a large family of viruses that cause illness ranging from the common cold to a more severe lung infection. <sub alias="covid 19">COVID-19</sub> is the disease caused by a novel coronavirus.</speak>
messages.displayText: The World Health Organization states that Coronaviruses (CoV) are a large family of viruses that cause illness ranging from the common cold to a more severe lung infection. COVID-19 is the disease caused by a novel coronavirus.

messages.title: COVID-19
messages.subtitle: COVID-19 is a new strain of virus that has not been previously identified in humans.

messages.speech: The World Health Organization states that Coronaviruses (CoV) are a large family of viruses that cause illness ranging from the common cold to a more severe lung infection. COVID-19 is the disease caused by a novel coronavirus.
